article_title: Sixth Israeli hostage death confirmed on Friday.
sentence: She  managed  to  call  her  family,  telling  them  Hamas  was  shooting  at  her.

article_title: Sixth Israeli hostage death confirmed on Friday.
sentence: Her  husband  Sami  was  killed  in  their  family  home  in  Kibbutz  Be'eri,  and  her  daughter  Yael  survived  after  barricading  herself  in  a  shelter.
